hero.title: This is how your ride becomes a

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Turning Everyday Cars Into
about.description: GeoWrap is a premium automotive customization and protection studio based in Tbilisi, Georgia, specializing in high-end vehicle wrapping and detailing services. With expert craftsmanship, premium materials, and a strong attention to detail, we deliver tailored solutions designed to enhance, protect, and elevate luxury and performance vehicles, ensuring flawless results and lasting value.

items.name: Paint Protection Film
items.description: Ultimate paint protection with invisible precision.
items.paragraph: Our Premium Paint Protection Film (PPF) shields your vehicle's surface from scratches, rock chips, and environmental damage while maintaining its original shine. Installed with expert precision, it ensures your car stays flawless for years without altering its appearance.

items.name: Colored Wraps
items.description: Transform your vehicle's look with stunning custom wraps.
items.paragraph: Whether you want a bold color change or a sleek matte finish, our premium vinyl wraps deliver both style and protection. Each wrap is precisely applied for a smooth, durable finish that turns your car into a true statement on the road.

items.name: Interior Detailing
items.description: Refresh and restore your car's interior to perfection.
items.paragraph: Our interior detailing service deep-cleans every inch of your cabin — from seats and carpets to dashboards and vents. We use premium products to remove stains, odors, and dust buildup, leaving your interior feeling brand new and hygienically fresh.

items.name: Ceramic Coatings
items.description: Long-lasting shine and protection against the elements.
items.paragraph: Our advanced ceramic coating creates a hydrophobic layer on your car's surface, protecting it from UV rays, oxidation, and contaminants. The result is an ultra-glossy finish that's easier to clean and keeps your car looking freshly detailed every day.

items.name: Wheel Powder Coating & Restoration
items.description: Revitalize your wheels with a durable and stylish finish.
items.paragraph: We restore and refinish your wheels with professional powder coating for a smooth, chip-resistant surface. Choose from a variety of finishes and colors to give your wheels a factory-fresh look while protecting them from rust and wear.

items.name: Window Tint
items.description: Cooler interiors, enhanced privacy, and UV protection.
items.paragraph: Our window tinting service combines aesthetics with functionality, blocking harmful UV rays and reducing glare. Professionally applied film ensures a seamless finish, improved comfort, and long-term protection for both you and your vehicle's interior.

items.name: Noise & Vibration Insulation
items.description: Drive in peace with superior sound and vibration control.
items.paragraph: Experience a quieter, smoother ride with our noise and vibration insulation solutions. Using high-quality materials, we reduce cabin noise, engine vibrations, and road rumble — giving your vehicle a premium, luxury-grade feel.

items.name: Polishing
items.description: Restore your car's deep gloss and remove imperfections.
items.paragraph: Our professional polishing process eliminates swirl marks, light scratches, and oxidation to bring back your paint's mirror-like shine. Perfect as a pre-ceramic treatment or for restoring your car's original luster after years of exposure.

items.name: Detailing Wash
items.description: More than a wash — a complete rejuvenation for your car.
items.paragraph: This in-depth cleaning process goes beyond a standard wash, targeting every detail of your car's exterior. From gentle hand washing to precise drying and tire care, our detailing wash restores your car's sparkle and showroom finish.

items.name: PDR Dent Repair
items.description: Flawless dent removal without damaging your paint.
items.paragraph: Our Paintless Dent Repair (PDR) technique removes dents and dings while preserving your vehicle's original finish. It's a fast, affordable, and eco-friendly solution that restores your car's smooth appearance without the need for repainting.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.heading: Ready To
contact.description: Reach out to us today and discover how we can elevate your automotive experience with our premium services and expert team.
